title: Health Device Integration
summary: As a developer, I want to integrate third-party health-monitoring devices with ALFRED so that I can provide personalized care based on real-time health data for elderly users.

title: Personalized Care Plan API Access
summary: As a developer, I want to access and modify users' personalized care plans through an API so that I can implement tailored health interventions effectively.

title: Health Alerts Configuration
summary: As a developer, I want to implement a system for configuring alerts based on health data trends so that users can receive timely notifications and caregivers can intervene when necessary.

title: User Health Data Visualization
summary: As a developer, I want access to a dashboard API that presents user health data visually so that I can help users and caregivers understand health trends over time.

title: Caregiver Access Control Implementation
summary: As a developer, I want to implement caregiver access control features so that users can easily manage permissions for their health information.

title: Data Privacy Compliance
summary: As a developer, I want to access an API that ensures my applications comply with data privacy regulations while handling user health information so that I can build secure and compliant healthcare applications for elderly users.
